thread.title: 19 Adorable Love Notes Boyfriends Left For Their Girlfriends

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: 19 Adorable Love Notes Boyfriends Left For Their Girlfriends
text:
1. This bae who dropped a romantic (bath)bombshell. my super great boyfriend is in CO so he put this note in my bathbomb üíú pic.twitter.com/cPiZBaKfDC
‚Äî Marlaina Lona (@marrlonz) January 1, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below "I kissed right here. Use only once at 12:00am CT Jan 1, 2017."
2. This guy who really went above and beyond. So I walk in the front door after an 11 hour day at work, to write grant applications and find my own dinner coz my lover is out and I see this. Hanging from the light in the entry hall. It reads "Liz! Love from above (and appreciation from below! By which I mean your butt.)" #lovenotes #domesticbliss #surprise #longday #treat #lover #love #butt #hustle #girlboss #bestboyfriend #sappy #craftanoon #hipster #aussieretro #interiordesign #handmade #funny #hashtagblessed
A photo posted by Elizaveta (@elizaveta_maltseva) on Feb 1, 2017 at 2:20am PST
3. This dude who adds up to be one hell of a great boyfriend. My boyfriend wrote a supportive note on every page of my notes for my math final üò≠üíñüíñ I'm so lucky pic.twitter.com/qjeWNySGO6
‚Äî April Ludgate (@N8VChey) December 5, 2016 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 4. This backpacking babe. Y'all my boyfriend got me the cutest leather bag for my birthday but the note was my favorite part ‚ù§Ô∏èüò≠ pic.twitter.com/KNlWqFMdlX
‚Äî Landon Romano (@landonromano) November 17, 2016 "Landon, if I could give you the world I would and one day we'll travel the world together. So until then you'll have this to remind you of me with every journey you take. ‚ÄîLove Blake <3"
5. This boy who puts Nicholas Sparks to shame. My sister's boyfriend's birthday was the 14th. My sister's birthday is tomorrow, the 16th. He left her this note today. I'm sobbing ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è pic.twitter.com/H0GJTjgWER
‚Äî dani (@aquarianbb) November 16, 2016 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 6. This man who just really missed his woman. My boyfriend slipped this note under the bathroom door. Haha üòÇ pic.twitter.com/tgaQ1QbrNo
‚Äî Charca Manilay ‚ôî (@charcamanilay) January 24, 2017 7. This teeny-tiny note giver with a huge heart. boyfriend passed me a note in class today pic.twitter.com/5qt3gELsGQ
‚Äî mia marlene (@miatrautz) September 16, 2016 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 8. This guy who did envelope-origami magic . came home from work to a love note from my boyfriend ‚ù§Ô∏è literally in tears üò¢üíñ pic.twitter.com/ferVDc0bqe
‚Äî „Ö§ (@vioIentwavez) September 2, 2016 9. This cinephile you'd want to go on infinite movie dates with. My boyfriend attached a note to each movie explaining why he got me it and what it meant to him or us, I'm truly blessed‚ù§Ô∏è pic.twitter.com/x65Yi7SrvE
‚Äî Giselle Hernandez (@Giselleher17) December 20, 2016 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 10. This dude to drive away with after your last final. I walk to my car after my Health 140 exam and find this note wedged in the side view mirror. My boyfriend is the cutest human being I can't pic.twitter.com/I62yQeTKO6
‚Äî Shaina Grace (@shaidelossantos) October 14, 2016 "Well I just wanted to tell you good job! And I am so proud of you baby girl!! Don't let anything get in the way or bring you down because you're better and stronger than that! I LOVE YOU MY BEAUTIFUL! <3 Jarren"
11. This sneaky S.O. with a small yet potent surprise. When you come back to your car to find that your boyfriend left you a note üòç pic.twitter.com/hRaHaSRVhT
‚Äî Gabrielle (@gvejdovec) August 17, 2016 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 12. This keeper who wrapped cookies in literal love. My boyfriend is so damn cute he put cookies in my backpack and put a note.üòçüòçüò≠ thank you so much baby üòåüíï‚ù§Ô∏è pic.twitter.com/OKkapc9wyt
‚Äî Ari (@arianah_navarro) January 18, 2017 13. This brilliant coffee brewer worth waking up early for. ‚óè Greatful for my phonominal fianc√© who takes the time to do the little things before he's off to work. I woke up this morning with a hot pot of coffee brewed, a banana to eat & a note that says 'I love you', its the little things! üçµüçå -- LOVE YOU BABE @dermidis #ifeelspecial #alwaysgoingtheextramile #lovenote #morningfeels #pourlove
A photo posted by Running On Faith & Fitness. (@makeup2007) on Feb 1, 2017 at 4:57pm PST
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 14. This downright hero who got his GF an Urban Decay palette but reinforced the fact that he thinks she's perfect. my boyfriend is the beeessss üòçüòãüíì he surprised me with this and a cute noteüòä pic.twitter.com/TCBdG8W6hg
‚Äî s a m m i (@sodamnfab_) September 24, 2015 15. This wonderful hubby-to-be who is committed to making even lame days worth celebrating. When you've had a rubbish day, home alone, and find this in your bathroomüí´üí´üí´üí´ #special #cute #note #fiance #cheerup #surprise #littlethings #lovenote #wedding #countdown thank you @jamesgladdish for cheering me up xxxx
A photo posted by Luce (@lostherpocket_xx) on Jan 31, 2017 at 10:43am PST
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 16. This patient partner who counted down a whole month to write this. When ur boyfriend tries to be cute and leave you a note but u have crazy OCD and this drives u insaneüôÉ pic.twitter.com/lk0FnBuZ3e
‚Äî Syd (@sydgriswolddd) January 29, 2017 17. This boyfriend who at least gets points for creativity (note: that is bathroom crayon, not blood.)
